mapper.insert: insert into mkt_question (QUESTION_ID, QUESTION_NAME, QUESTION_TYPE, QUESTION_DESC, ANSWER_TYPE, DEFAULT_ANSWER, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{questionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{questionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update mkt_question set QUESTION_NAME = #{questionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUESTION_TYPE = #{questionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUESTION_DESC = #{questionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANSWER_TYPE = #{answerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFAULT_ANSWER = #{defaultAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where QUESTION_ID = #{questionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select QUESTION_ID, QUESTION_NAME, QUESTION_TYPE, QUESTION_DESC, ANSWER_TYPE, DEFAULT_ANSWER, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from mkt_question where QUESTION_ID = #{questionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select QUESTION_ID, QUESTION_NAME, QUESTION_TYPE, QUESTION_DESC, ANSWER_TYPE, DEFAULT_ANSWER, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from mkt_question
